title: The Crucifixion
creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
brief_description: The camera studies, in close-up, the crucifixion scenes in silver bas relief by the artist Matcham Skipper. This film was photographed in St Mary’s Church, Ivanhoe, Victoria. In place of a narration, the soundtrack uses biblical quotations. Photographed by Giorgio Mangiamele.
